channel.title: ~The Dark Bow~
channel.description: I was just informed by a player of my server that dark bow trains strength. I did not know that. So, how would I change it to train range?

item.title: ~The Dark Bow~
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“elwappo08, post:8, topic:216576”]Make the dark bow id number and copy all the magic bow codes in your server then make new codes right by the magic bow codes and just replace the magic bow id with the dark bow id…

I take it you’re using Czar.[/quote]

Nope… I’m using pre-czar it’s called satan’s isle

Read full topic

item.title: ~The Dark Bow~
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

under ur client.java thing - it would say like

addSkillXP((5*playerLevel[playerThieving]), playerThieving);

and (i’m not sure bout this)
it says addSKillXP((5*
5 is theiving (apparently)
if u could find what number strength is
for range it would be this

addSkillXP((6000*playerLevel[4]), 4);

change the 6000 to however many xp u get when u train str
and make player level (whatever strenth is) to 4 which is rng

Read full topic
